title: Beta Client Problems
body:
Hey there so just curious as to whether or not Riot has said anything about:

a) not being able to see your friends list while in champ select (I only know about ranked Flex queue, not normal/TT/ARAM)
b) the window not being manually resizable (only has 3 preset sizes in the settings menu)
c) chat window not being manually resizable or text size being changeable
and finally d) the removal of the "second menu" of character stats in-game (e.g. Life Steal, Armor Pen, Magic Pen etc).

Seems like oversights as opposed to intentional design decisions, or perhaps they're just not "priority" right now, though that would not explain the second menu not existing anymore.
